summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new POS Car Wash features: Outlet Management, Products Page, Customer Transaction Export, and Subscription Payment Method. Fixed critical SelectItem empty value bug in ProductsPage.js and SettingsPage.js. All 19 backend API tests passed. All frontend features working correctly.

bugs_fixed.issue: SelectItem with empty string value causing runtime error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed value='' to value='none' and updated onValueChange handler to convert 'none' back to empty string

bugs_fixed.issue: Same SelectItem empty value error in Add User and Edit User dialogs for outlet selection
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed value='' to value='none' in both dialogs and updated handlers

seed_data_creation: Created test product 'Test Parfum Mobil' during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working correctly: (1) Outlet Management in Settings page with CRUD operations and user assignment, (2) Products page with full CRUD and category support, (3) Customer transaction export in detail dialog, (4) Subscription payment method for member transactions with Rp 0 total. Fixed SelectItem empty value bug in ProductsPage.js and SettingsPage.js. Backend has PaymentMethod.SUBSCRIPTION enum. Test member phone 081234567890 has Monthly membership with 29 days remaining.
